profile.ja:
1983年-1990年 上智大学理工学部機械工学科助手 油圧制御弁内の流動解析についての研究
1990年-1999年 足利工業大学工学部機械工学科助教授、教授 機能性流体に関する研究および油圧機器に関する研究
1999年-現在 上智大学理工学部機能創造理工学科教授 基礎流体力学，流体機械および機能性流体に関する研究
profile.en:
1983-1990 Research associate of Department of Mechanical Engineering, Sophia University
Flow analysis in the oil hydraulic control valve
1990-1999 Associate Professor, Professor of Department of Mechanical Engineering, Ashikaga Institute of Technology, Study on the functional fluid and Development of oil hydraulic components
1999-Present Professor of Department of Engineering and Applied Sciences, Sophia University, Basic fluid mechanics, Flow characteristics of high intelligent fluids, the flow analysis in oil hydraulic control valves, the flow-induced vibration, the investigation of fluid flow in pumps and so on.

paper_title.en: Study on EHD pump with multi-holes electrode

description.en: One of an electrohydrodynamics (EHD) phenomenon is the induced flow of a functional fluid in the presence of an electric field. In this paper, we describe a small pump in which the flow is generated by such an EHD phenomenon. In the case of pumps based on cylindrical electrodes, which thus far have been the focus of our research on EHD pumps, the total circumference length of the edge of the holes in the electrode that generates the rotational flow is small, leading to a small overall one-directional flow velocity. To increase this area, we produced two different electrode pumps in which the electrode (cylindrical; 6 mm diameter, 1 mm width) contains multiple holes. We measured the pressure-flow rate characteristics of our pumps and compared their performances.
